Activity: Log in, check emails and project management system for any updates or urgent issues. Prepare for the end-of-week sprint review and planning meeting.
Finalize any outstanding tasks and ensure all code is properly documented and tested. Prepare a demonstration of the work completed during the week.
Participate in the sprint review meeting, showcasing the team's accomplishments and discussing any challenges encountered. Provide constructive feedback and suggestions for improvement.
Participate in the sprint planning meeting, collaborating with the team to define the goals and priorities for the next sprint. Provide input on the technical feasibility of proposed features.
Refactor code to address technical debt accumulated during the sprint. Improve code quality and maintainability.
Write technical documentation for new features or systems implemented during the sprint. Ensure the documentation is clear, concise, and easy to understand.

Collaborate with @NDES-1 to integrate narrative elements into the game. Review dialogue scripts, cutscene animations, and environmental storytelling elements. Talk about the interaction and cutscene animation with @3DMOD-2.
Complete weekly report, summarize key accomplishments, challenges, and lessons learned. Submit the report to @PROD-1 and archive all relevant documentation.
